cast.name: 迈克尔·格雷德 Michael Grade
蒂姆·莱斯-奥克斯利 Tim Rice-Oxley

this_title: Tim Rice: A Life in Song
introduction: A celebration of the songwriting of Tim Rice, with Tim Minchin and Alexander Armstrong.Hosted by Michael Grade, the concert highlights the colossal impact Tim Rice has had on stage and screen.From The Lion King, Evita and Jesus Christ Superstar to James Bond and beyond, hear his most renowned songs performed live, accompanied by the BBC Concert Orchestra conducted by Mike Dixon.Multiple-Oscar winner Tim Rice is also in conversation with Michael Grade about his life and career, the composers he has worked with and how different songs came to life.The evening is a chance not only to hear fabulous songs but also to step into the life and mind of one of the world's most respected and iconic songwriters.Performer line-upAlexander ArmstrongRob BrydonClare TealCynthia ErivoDiana VickersFrances RuffelleGemma ArtertonJames FoxJulian OvendenRick WakemanSeth LakemanSophie Ellis-BextorTim MinchinTom ChaplinRobert LonsdaleRoger DaltreyRufus WainwrightUrban Voices CollectiveThe show is being filmed by the BBC for broadcast at a later date.PerformersRob BrydonTom ChaplinJulian Ovenden
chinese_title: Tim Rice: A Life in Song
